title: Orthodontics
description: Our Orthodontics department specializes in braces, aligners, and other corrective treatments to help patients achieve straighter teeth and a confident smile.

title: Pediatric Dentistry
description: Our Pediatric Dentistry department is dedicated to providing dental care for children, ensuring a positive and comfortable experience for young patients.

title: Oral Surgery
description: The Oral Surgery department focuses on surgical procedures related to the mouth and jaw, including extractions, implants, and corrective surgeries.

title: Endodontics
description: Endodontics deals with the interior of the tooth, performing root canals and treating dental pulp-related issues to save damaged or infected teeth.

title: Periodontics
description: Periodontics focuses on the health of the gums and supporting structures of the teeth. Our specialists treat gum diseases and perform gum-related surgeries.

title: Prosthodontics
description: Prosthodontics involves the design, manufacture, and fitting of artificial teeth replacements such as dentures, bridges, and dental implants for patients with missing teeth.
